title: Can we block teammates from banning our pick intents?????
body: my own teammate purposely banned my champion because he was mad that i got the lane he wanted and i wouldnt switch with him

replies.body: you probably one of the people who do that childish stuff

Or I'm someone who doesn't like the current champion mechanics of {{champion:67}}  or {{champion:134}} so my protest against this is to ban the champion regardless. I'm sorry you want to play a champion that is objectively overpowered or dare we say broken. But that's not my problem now is it?
I usually pick something that's awful at the lane when they do that.
